Quite a while ago, I shared a draft of an &#39;Investigator&#39; playbook I styled after the detective-trope. After some play-testing, I made a few changes which hopefully make the entire thing a bit less wonky. Sharing it here for those interested.Â <br /><br />Feedback is, of course, appreciated. And if anyone ever gives it a spin, I&#39;d love to hear if it works out!<br /><br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BzuG4my2HZ_fWjlkZUgxUUlKUlE" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BzuG4my2HZ_fWjlkZUgxUUlKUlE</a><br />
